"A.D.2028/4/7/19:00": "FUN FUN FUN! I'm done sowing the seeds. Now, the best STAGE is on STANDBY!"
"All I need now is to wait for our MAIN ACTORS. Hitsugi GIRL! <%me>!"
"OH SHIT! I should've CUT out the BORING HOTLINE ZE!"
"YES? Keep the urgent matters short, YOU SEE?"

"Bethor... Stop this nonsense. There are limits
as too how much we can cover-up.
If you keep repeating it in the same location..."
"Mother loves this land. Causing indiscreet harm is unforgivable. How long do you plan to continue these acts of meaningless destruction?"
"Hahaha! That's something I wanted to confirm with Hitsugi-GIRL, right?"
"She always escapes to a place where we can't reach her, after all. We just need her to come out where we can, right?"
"Just to be clear, this was a request from Mother ZE. There's no reason to stop, right?!"
"I'm saying that you've gone too far. Our goal isn't to destroy Earth..."
"I SEE, I SEE, UNDERSTAND. I'm tired of hearing it already, are we good? Annnnd, click!"
"Geez, they don't understand a thing, do they? This is the only opportunity to film a live SPECTACLE like this ZE!"
"Over there lies EXCITEMENT! The scene that the entire world craves for, lies there!"
"Don't you agree, Mother? That's why I decided to take YOUR invitation."
"Let's queue the CLAPPING BOARD! For the best film ever!"
